1484830.name: Last Days
1484830.description:
Play as ordinary person trying to reassebmle her life on the background of unfolding military conflict.

World

Travel home though war raveged lands and plague infected terretories. Explore various locations of dying world - from jungles and sea traveling, to medieval towns and cold northern villages. Story takes place around late middle ages and early modern period times.

Gameplay

  • Linear storytelling with cutscenes and cinematic events
  • Fast action combat system based on dodges and parries rather than hp bars
  • Vaious meele and ranged weapons
  • Unique character death system
1484830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
